I really, really like Portal 2, and i would definitely recommend it. It's very fun, though i think SOME of the levels could have been a bit harder. All in all it's a cool, an fun puzzlegame. Only thing that makes me a bit mad, is that i bought it just 2 days before it was on sale. Anyways, I think you really deserve the money!

This game was fun and mentally stimulating.  Not a whole lot of video games that I had played up until this point really make you utilize critical thinking skills, so this was a refreshing change of pace.
Buy this now !!!!

Foi um triunfo

Estou escrevendo aqui: GRANDE SUCESSO.

É difícil expressar minha satisfação.

Aperture Science (compania de pesquisas)

Nós fazemos o que devemos

porque podemos.

Pelo bem de todos nós.

Exceto dos que estão mortos.

Mas não faz sentido chorar por cada erro.

você continua tentando até ficar sem bolo.

E a ciencia é feita.

E você faz uma arma bacana.

Para aqueles que ainda estão vivos.

Nem estou brava.

Estou sendo tão sincera agora.

Mesmo depois de partir meu coração.

E me matar.

E me quebrar em pedaços.

E jogar cada pedaço no fogo.

Eles queimaram e isso doeu porque estava feliz por

você! Agora estes dados formam uma bela linha.

E saímos da beta.

E estamos lançando a tempo.

então eu estou contente. Eu fui queimada.

Pense em tudo que aprendemos

para aqueles que ainda estão vivos.

Vá em frente e me deixe.

Acho que é melhor ficar aqui dentro.

Talvez você ache alguém que te ajude.

Talvez Black Mesa

FOI UMA PIADA.

HAHA. BOA TENTATIVA.

De qualquer jeito, o bolo esta ótimo.

É tão delicioso e molhadinho.

Olha pra mim, falando

quando há ciência pra fazer.

Quando eu olho pra fora, isso me faz feliz não ser você.

Tenho experimentos a fazer.

Tem pesquisas pra fazer.

Naqueles que ainda estão vivos.

E acredite em mim, eu ainda estou viva.

Eu estou fazendo ciência, e ainda estou viva.

Eu me sinto FANTÁSTICA, e ainda estou viva.

Enquanto você estiver morrendo ainda vou estar viva.

E quando você morrer ainda vou estar viva.

ESTAR VIVA!

That game, remember it? you know that one you wanted so bad but everytime you remembered it you didnt have any spare money on you? Well heres your reminder. And if you dont know what that game is, its this one. You know why? Beacause its awesome, sometimes i forget if i was either playing a game or ive been alone for a very long time. In a nutshell, its an epic game. Why? I dont know, science has yet to comprehend it. So why don't you go on over there and test that gun that shoots portals, and figure it out for yourself. That will keep you busy. Thinking with portals.

Ok, I don't really like writing reviews and stuff, but since it's on sale and someone might read this at some point maybe, I will. Please. Buy. This. Game. Please. If you don't already own it, buy it now. This is probably my (and many other's) favorite video game of all time. The humor, the gameplay, the characters, the environments, the creepy easter eggs, the overall awesomeness of... well.... do I even need to go on? Why read this when you could be having fun... with science!

Portal 2 is much longer than the first, but it's still one of my favorite games.  The difficulty of the puzzles is the same, but they added a lot more elements to them.  I can't decide which one I like more.  This game is just as fantastic as the first.

Why would I not recomend this game? This was born out of pure aweseomness and did not let me down when I was expecting something great after the first one. 
Besides you get to carry a potato with you for a few levels ;)

игра класная как одиночка так и совместный режим. В одиночке вам попадутся интересные посхалки такие как поющие турэльки или достежение когда вам надо спасти турэлку от смерти и она поблагодарив вас раскажет вам о многом интересном например кто такая гладос или зарание предупридит что не стоит есть лимоны(кто играл тот поймет) также интересно  зайти в дополнительные испытания совмместного режима или в испытания сообщества в steam. рекомендую зайти на ютуб и посмотреть пару видео по пасхалкам и достяжениям и вы не пожелеете. насамом деле я прошол портол 2 около 3-х раз на xbox 360 и 1 раз на компе и не пожелел веть каждый раз я находил что нибудь новенькое и приятное
Incredible game, still playing it after 3 years with all the great community maps.

good
Beast game.

Portal 1 was revolution, while Portal 2 perfected the art.  I really enjoyed the story and the humor that peppered the entire thing.
My only critique of the game would be that it is somewhat less "open" than the first, meaning that there are fewer ways to solve each challenge, forcing the player to choose the "right" one.  That said, I would still definitely recommend it to anyone who likes 3D puzzle games.

Good followup to the surprise hit from The Orange Box. Clearly a lot of the magic has worn off with the introduction of more characters and backstory, but still a very solid puzzle game. The co-op is also fun if you can find someone to play with, but don't expect replays to be worth much.
